definition: A unit of time that typically consists of seven consecutive days, commonly used to refer to a specific period within a larger timeframe. It is often employed to indicate the duration between two events or to schedule activities within a set timeframe.

examples.german: Diese Woche habe ich viel Arbeit.
examples.english: I have a lot of work this week.

examples.german: NÃ¤chste Woche fahre ich in den Urlaub.
examples.english: Next week I'm going on vacation.

examples.german: Jeden Montag habe ich einen Termin.
examples.english: I have an appointment every Monday.
